title: OS Sierra won't connect to PvP
body:
Hi fellow summoners,

So I was in the middle of my game on my MacBookPro when it suddenly froze and I had to force quit it. Then I was unable to log in. So I reinstalled the game and it still wouldn't let me log in. After typing in my password and username and entering, it takes about 10 minutes before it says "Error: Cannot connect to PvP.net." It has been three days since and I have tried every possible way of fixing it and i still cannot log in. I have now reinstalled 6 times. It is driving me crazy that I cannot find a solution to this problem.

For everyone who is gonna say "get a real laptop and throw the Mac", I know, I hate Mac too but my other pc broke and I am using a hand me down until I can afford to buy a new pc.

Please help, desperate for solutions. Also, I am now using OS Sierra, 10.12.

replies.body:
Issues connecting to PvP.net are an indication that your computer cannot properly reach our servers. Our [Mac connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) is a great resource for common solutions that should resolve this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
